title: Fantasy Court With Bill Simmons l The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
We run through Aaron Rodgers’s career day (1:30); injuries to Patrick Mahomes, Matt Ryan, and Drew Brees; and which quarterbacks are good streaming candidates for Week 8 (9:00). Then Bill Simmons joins the show for a new segment called Fantasy Court (30:30).
Hosts: Danny Kelly, Danny Heifetz, and Craig Horlbeck
Guest: Bill Simmons

Submit your Fantasy Court questions to the Ringer NFL Show Facebook page.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
